channel.title: How to Create an Npc on your server?
channel.description:
Basically what i want to know is, how would i insert a jad onto my server? without havin to use the command ::npc -id here- Anyone know of a way i can make Jad appear at, lets say at that empty spot, near tea stall just east of Varrok east bank.
Help is MUCH appreciated.
~Thanks.
